Class Investment

  • Constructor Details

    • Investment

      public Investment(Investment copy)
      This method creates a copy of an Investment object
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • remove

      public abstract double[] remove(ArrayList<Investment> investments, int quantity, double price)
      This method returns the payment and gain of the investment whose shares are to be sold and that investment should be removed
      Parameters:
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      quantity - Integer representing the quantity of the investment(to be removed) whose shares are to be sold
      price - Double representing the price of the investment(to be removed) whose shares are to be sold
      Returns:
      Double[],which is an array of double values where the elements are the payment and gain of an investment

    • sell

      public abstract double[] sell(int quantity, int availQuantity, double price, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the payment,gain and the remaining bookValue of the investment whose shares are to be sold
      Parameters:
      quantity - Integer representing the quantity of the investment whose shares are to be sold
      availQuantity - Integer representing the existing quantity of the investment whose shares are to be sold
      price - Double representing the price of the investment whose shares are to be sold
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Double[],which is an array of double values where the elements are the payment, gain and the remaining bookValue of an investment

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object other)
      This method compares the passed Investment object with another and returns a boolean value based on equality
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      other - Object representing the object to be compared with the investment.
      Returns:
      boolean if the passed object is equal to the investment, it returns true otherwise returns false

      public void setPrice(String price)
      This method updates the price of a specific investment
      Parameters:
      price - String representing the quantity of a specific investment
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when price does not have digits as characters or if the digit is less than 1

    • symbolExists

      public static int symbolExists(String symbol, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the index position of the given investment symbol from its ArryayList
      Parameters:
      symbol - String representing symbol of that investment
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Integer,which is the index position of the given investment symbol from its ArryayList

    • duplicateInvestment

      public static int duplicateInvestment(String type, String symbol, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method checks if a new investment has the same symbol as an existing investment and vice-versa returns 0 if the new investment's symbol does not already exist returns 1 if the new investment's symbol already exists
      Parameters:
      type - String representing the investment type
      symbol - String representing symbol of that investment
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Integer,which is the index position of the given investment symbol from its ArryayList

    • nameExists

      public static String nameExists(int indexName, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the investment's name for a given index position from the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      indexName - Int representing the index position of that investment in its ArrayList
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      String,which is the name of the investment at that index position in its ArryayList

    • bookValueExists

      public static double bookValueExists(int indexName, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the investment's bookValue for a given index position from the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      indexName - Int representing the index position of that investment in its ArrayList
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Double,which is the bookValue of the investment at that index position in its ArryayList

    • quantityExists

      public static String quantityExists(int indexName, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the investment's quantity for a given index position from the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      indexName - Int representing the index position of that investment in its ArrayList
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Integer,which is the quantity of the investment at that index position in its ArryayList

    • buy

      public static double[] buy(int investmentFound, int quantity, double price, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the updated bookValue and quantity of the investment whose shares are to be purchased
      Parameters:
      investmentFound - Integer representing the index position of the investment whose shares are to be purchased
      quantity - Integer representing the quantity of the investment whose shares are to be purchased
      price - Double representing the price of the investment whose shares are to be purchased
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Double[],which is an array of double values where the elements are the updated bookValue and quantity of an investment

    • calculateGain

      public static double calculateGain(ArrayList<Investment> investments, JTextArea getGainMessage)
      This method calculates the gain for all the investments
      Parameters:
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      getGainMessage - JTextArea which is the message area for the "getGain" JFrame
      Returns:
      Double, which is the total gain of Portfolio
